markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Ulgrem-Lurann](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1744)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

[Ulgrem-Axaan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1743) has a limited ability to respond to magical telepathy with a handful of words in Necril. The name Ulgrem-Axaan originally comes from the creature itself, and the rough approximation in Necril suggests that Ulgrem was its species with Axaan noting it as the last of its kind. Characters capable of cleansing Ulgrem-Axaan's eggs can watch the hatchlings grow into creatures resembling Ulgrem-Axaan, save that they lack any kind of undead touch. Upon seeing these young for the first time, if Ulgrem-Axaan is able to do so, it grants them the name “Ulgrem-Lurann.” Through the same rough approximation, Ulgrem-Lurann means something akin to “Children of Ulgrem.”

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Beast](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2), [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10)): DC 23

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Ulgrem-Lurann](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1744)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Amphibious" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=207" />
<trait label="Beast" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=20" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Monsters of Myth](/Sources.aspx?ID=107) pg. 119

**Perception** +12; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Druidic](/Languages.aspx?ID=23); (can't speak)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +10, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +1

**Wis** -2

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Bump in the River** An Ulgrem-Lurann can pretend to be a floating log while in water by attempting a [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) check. It has a +2 circumstance bonus to its checks and DCs to do so. While using Stealth this way, creatures see the log but don't realize it's an Ulgrem-Lurann.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 18 

**Fort** +12 

**Ref** +10 

**Will** +5 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 55

</row>

**Resistances**
[electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56) 5, piercing 5

**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** <actions string="Reaction" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet, swim 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +13 ([reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d8+6 piercing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
tail +13 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Nurtured Loathing**   An Ulgrem-Lurann gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack and damage rolls against creatures with the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) trait.

**Sparking Bite** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56)) **Requirements** The Ulgrem-Lurann has a creature [grabbed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=20) with its jaws; **Effect** Electricity courses through its body and mouth, dealing an additional 1d4+6 electricity damage to the grabbed target with a DC 20 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save.

**[Swallow Whole](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=35)** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15)) Small, 1d6+6 bludgeoning, Rupture 9

</column>
name: Ulgrem-Lurann
